_setAdjusterCoefficient(uint256).details: Admin function to set per-market adjuster coefficient

params.newAdjusterCoefficient: The new adjuster coefficient, scaled by 1e18

_setBaseRatePerYear(uint256).details: Admin function to set per-market base interest rate

params.newBaseRateMantissa: The new base interest rate, scaled by 1e18

_setUpdateFrequency(uint256).details: Admin function to set the update frequency

params.newUpdateFrequency: The new update frequency, in seconds

params._baseRatePerYear: The approximate target base APR, as a mantissa (scaled by 1e18), set by admin, default 2%

params.borrows: The total amount of borrows the market has outstanding
params.cash: The total amount of cash the market has
params.reserves: The total amount of reserves the market has

returns._0: The borrow rate per block (as a percentage, and scaled by 1e18)
Note's supply rate percentage per block as a mantissa (scaled by 1e18)

FailedPriceRetrieval(address).notice: reverted if the getUnderlying Price fails

SenderNotAdmin(address).notice: reverted if sender is not admin

NewAdjusterCoefficient(uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted when adjuster coefficient is changed by admin

NewAdmin(address,address).notice: Emitted when new admin is set

NewBaseRate(uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted when base rate is changed by admin

NewInterestParams(uint256).notice: Emitted when new baserateperblock is set

NewPriceOracle(address,address).notice: Emitted when new PriceOracle is set

NewUpdateFrequency(uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted when update frequency is changed by admin

BlocksPerYear().notice: The approximate number of blocks per year that is assumed by the interest rate model

_setAdjusterCoefficient(uint256).notice: Sets the adjuster coefficient for Note

_setBaseRatePerYear(uint256).notice: Sets the base interest rate for Note

_setUpdateFrequency(uint256).notice: Sets the update frequency for Note's interest rate

adjusterCoefficient().notice: The level of aggressiveness to adjust interest rate according to twap's deviation from the peg

baseRatePerBlock().notice: baseRatePerBlock The per block interest rate, as a mantissa (scaled by 1e18)

baseRatePerYear().notice: baseRatePerYear The per year interest rate, as a mantissa (scaled by 1e18)

getBorrowRate(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Calculates the current borrow interest rate per block

getSupplyRate(uint256,uint256,uint256,ui.notice: Calculates the current supply rate per block, which is the same as the borrow rateThe following parameters are irrelevent for calculating Note's interest rate. They are passed in to align with the standard function definition `getSupplyRate` in InterestRateModel

isInterestRateModel().notice: Indicator that this is an InterestRateModel contract (for inspection)

lastUpdateBlock().notice: The variable to keep track of the last update on Note's interest rate, initialized at the current block number

updateBaseRate().notice: Updates the Note's base rate per year at a given interval (Update Frequency)This interest rate is calculated as follows f(x) = max(0, (1 - $NOTE) * adjusterCoefficient + priorInterestRate ) If Note is trading above 1$ then lower the interest rate to benefit suppliers This function is called in accrue Interest by the cNote Contract

updateFrequency().notice: The frequency of updating Note's base rate
